comment: If there is only a finite number of vertices, the number of closed walks of fixed length (as words) is also finite. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Mar-2018.) (Revised by AV, 25-Apr-2021.) (Proof shortened by AV, 22-Mar-2022.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 18-Nov-2022.)
